tool_description: Earth observation APIs at warp speed maintaining privacy
name: Observearth
title: Observearth

api_list.name: get_bands_sentinel_2_l2a_bands_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://observearth.p.rapidapi.com/sentinel-2-l2a/bands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "observearth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://observearth.p.rapidapi.com/sentinel-2-l2a/bands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "observearth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
